page.title: 17SCHOOL LIFE,CAREW AREA,TENBY
page.content: Throughout the school year we have a number of different interesting and enjoyable events. Every October we hold a{bazaar. Our total profit usually exceeds Â£1,000 which goes into school funds. In December there is a{Christmas {concert.}The parents come to watch. We have a{Christmas party}during which we all receive a present from Father Christmas.There is a{Christmas {dinner}and afterwards we watch a film. Early in the year we have{nettball {and soccer tournaments.}We compete against other schools in the area. In the Summer we have our{School {Sports.}There are also{House nettball {and soccer matches}at this time and {nettball,soccer and athletic awards. Every Summer we have a{school trip. {Various environmental journeys}are also undertaken during the year.
